name: TLC Game BR
description:
- TLC Game appeared around 2017, it was just a game between friends but today it came to the public!
- Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory! Use your weapons to dominate the battlefield.
- Compete with friends or players from around the world using some of the world's deadliest modern weapons. Play with up to 20 players.
- TLC takes place during the epic struggles of World War 3, where a fictional Cold War has erupted.

*Arenas:

- The Desert

--------------------------------------------------

*Game Modes:

- Free For All (FFA),
- Team Death Match (TDM),
- Territories/Cover Point (CP),
- Capture Of Flag (CTF),
- Elimination (ELIM),
- Gun Race (GR),
- Demolition (DM).
